name: Splenvid
overview:
Splenvid automatically creates captivating movies from your content.

Movies provide the most engaging way to tell a story. But creating movies has been time-consuming and difficult. We end up either just sharing occasional snippets with each other, or nothing at all.

Splenvid is your automated movie director and editor in the cloud. Capture your experiences with the mobile app and Splenvid automatically creates compelling movies from your content. You never have to think about making a movie. It’s zero-button movie creation.

Because many of life’s best moments are experienced with others, Splenvid is collaborative. When you’re connected with your friends and they’re also using Splenvid, their content is intertwined with yours.

With Splenvid, your movie compilations are stored safely and securely in the cloud. You can keep them as your own personal video journal, share them with friends and family, or broadcast them to the world.

Founded in 2012 by two former Googlers, Splenvid is located in San Francisco, CA.
